concept.title: RPC
concept.shortdesc: The RPC origin reads data passed from an RPC destination over the WAN. Use the RPC origin as part of an RPC destination pipeline that reads data from an RPC destination in the origin pipeline.

conbody.p: originsRPCRPC originsoverviewWhen you configure the RPC origin, you define the port that the origin listens to for data. The port number must be one of the <host>:<port> combinations defined in the RPC destination that provides the data.
Similarly, the RPC ID in the RPC origin must match the RPC ID used in the RPC destination.
You can configure the origin to use HTTPS to securely transfer data.
